who is sekh hasina and her histry

Sheikh Hasina is a Bengali politician who served as the Prime Minister of Bangladesh from 1996 to 2001 and again from 2009 to 2024. She is the longest-serving prime minister in the history of Bangladesh.

Sheikh Hasina is the daughter of Sheikh Mujibur Rahman, the founding father of Bangladesh. She has been the leader of the Awami League political party since 1981.

She has been in power for over 20 years, making her the longest-serving prime minister in the history of Bangladesh.
who is now prime misister of bangladesh

According to the real-time data I have, as of June 15, 2025, Sheikh Hasina was sworn in for a fifth term as Bangladesh Prime Minister on January 11, 2024. However, she fled the country on August 5, 2024, following a massive uprising. Therefore, as of now, Sheikh Hasina is not the current Prime Minister of Bangladesh.

You want to know about the word "exit". According to the search results, "exit" can be used as a noun, verb, and interjection. It generally means to leave or go out of a place, such as a building, room, or vehicle. It can also refer to a way out or a point of departure.

As a verb, "exit" means to leave or go out of a place, or to stop doing something.

There are many synonyms for "exit", including "leave", "go out", "depart", "quit", and "withdraw".

You can find more information about the word "exit" on various online dictionaries, such as Merriam-Webster, Cambridge Dictionary, and Dictionary.com.
